landing_description_top: Easily keep track of your income and expenses
landing_description_bottom: and collaborate with others to do shared budgeting
landing_example_balance_title: See your total balance at a glance
landing_example_entries_title: All your income, expenses, and withdrawals
landing_example_breakdown_title: Breakdown of all time and monthly expenses
add_entry_error: Something went wrong while saving your entry. Please try again or reach out if the issue persists
add_entry_no_category: Choose a category for this entry
payment_value_exceeded_error: Total paid amount can't exceed entry total
partner_add_error: We couldn't send your invitation. Make sure your partner has an account and that you spelled their email correctly.
partner_add_title: Add a partner to your account
partner_add_description: Partners will be able to see and edit all information you've added up to this point. Likewise, you'll be able to see and edit any information they have added.
